name: Something In My Coffee
description:
A mixed reality game where you find an unexpected visitor in your coffee cup while working from home. Make sure you're sitting at a desk when you play!

All audio and programming were done by me, with some visuals taken from SketchFab.com and the Unity Asset store. Credits for 3D Models to:

Ole Gunnar Isager - Mug

Xavi Pujadas - Alien Communicator

Oleg Gamulinskiy - Portal Visuals
